title: Jhin got a secret buff in today's PBE update

embed.description: This is a W ORK I N P ROGRESS POST. Today's update is HUGE! Going to take a while to get through it all. Thank you for your patience!][ Status: The PBE currently still down for maintenance.] The PBE has been updated! Continue reading for more information!

replies.body:
http://40.media.tumblr.com/0e46075860e496df247bb7cf612a73fa/tumblr_o3kywlLTjU1sasyx5o1_1280.png

Wards have now reached perfecjhin :p

> [{quoted}](name=Blue Moon Wolf,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Nbh1AkdU,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-04-20T00:15:50.108+0000)

when you 4th shot the ward just right

That pun was a jhinius one,my friend.
I hope that you are jhinerous enough to give us some more.
That was beautiful
Beautiful
yo gypsylord can you tell us the history behind what inspired you name? cuz i dnt think you have been interviewed on the league podcast yet .-.
I think he's said he named himself after his dog, gypsy, and because he was really into fantasy stuff at the time, hence lord
by golly ithink your right and i think he was on the show...

While you're here, and I can ask this relating to said bullet effect, can I ask why Graves cannot gain an extra bullet when using his E to give him 3 *only if he already has 2 in stock*? Not that I don't want to go against any balance issues, but it doesn't feel like his original E that gave him a boost in AS, when it can't even give him an extra bullet unless he has lost one already. As strong as Graves is on a one on one, he lacks the push he could have. Its not until late game that the bullets aren't a issue, but I've always had a issue with the fact that if I E away from a enemy, I still only fire two shots at them unless I let them come into my 425 range so that I can hit them, back away and try two more.

I just want to put this somewhere
http://i.imgur.com/XDro43M.gif
why did they nerf wards

they always nerf vision a long time ago all supports where ward bitches now its slightly not as bad....
of course this nerf probs for Graves and Jhin
I wouldn't call it secret. They probably made this change solely for Jhin and Graves.
Why wouldnt they just make them do 2 damage to wards on last hit in the clip? That makes sense.
Cause then its a direct buff to only Jhin and Graves. This way its a buff for Jhin and Graves, but a minor buff to everyone else as well.

Not saying you're right or wrong about what Riot is doing. But you seem to be missing the point in this particular case. You responded to someone who responded to this:
>They probably made this change **solely** for Jhin and Graves.
It's not a buff to everyone else; it's a nerf to everyone who places pink wards.

Because it wouldn't be 4

And if it's not 4 it hasn't reached perfecjhin
you guys are talking about things that actually affect gameplay, and I'm just sitting here spazzing out about the Warhammer 40k themed skins.(mostly kayle)
http://i.imgur.com/XS5LK.gif?noredirect

"Warhammer 40k skins"

Brother, I hate to break this to you, but Plague Doctors, Inquisitors, etc, have existed for a LONG time before 40k did.

> [{quoted}](name=Various Felonies,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Nbh1AkdU,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2016-04-20T08:42:49.732+0000)
>
> "Warhammer 40k skins"
> 
> Brother, I hate to break this to you, but Plague Doctors, Inquisitors, etc, have existed for a LONG time before 40k did.

All of which have been described as Gothic, which is what the Imperium of Man is theme'ed around.
never even heard of warhammer 40k, ima google it

Blood for the Blood God
Skulls for the Skull  throne.


Also.


GORKA MORKA GORKA MORKA GORKA MORKA GORKA MORKA MORE DAKKA
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=4EOKOAQrlLI
It's a buff to {{champion:104}} too. Now he won't have to reload 2 times to kill a pink.

...For everyone? Wow, lol. Why...its as if vision is going to get harder and harder lol.


Still, as a Jhin player this is outstanding.
but they reg now
whats next? complete removal of wards altogether?
THIS TOOK ME WAY TOO LONG TO REALIZE WHAT THIS HAD TO DO WITH JHIN
That's the first thing i thought of when i read that.

http://img01.deviantart.net/d486/i/2016/072/1/6/when_you_hit_your_fourth_shot_just_right_by_pailknight-d9uz10w.png

Just perfect

_Looks up Velkoz_

Wtf does research do?

_Looks up Veigar_

That passive name...
Research makes you ult do true damage in return for it no longer applying your passive. Unless of course this is a joke in which case I can now see it leaving the atmosphere.

How dare they nerf my pink wards!

I shall defend them with zealotry!
